Sat, 09 Jun 2007 21:50:18 PDT Date: Sat, 9 Jun 2007 21:50:18 -0700 (PDT) From: Ginger Lea To: admins@theplanet.com MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="0-1660519368-1181451018=:91023" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit Message-ID: <117774.91023.qm@web63910.mail.re1.yahoo.com> Subject: [ADMINS] Website X-BeenThere: planetadmins@lists.theplanet.com X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.7 Precedence: list List-Id: The Planet Admins list List-Unsubscribe: , List-Archive: List-Post: List-Help: List-Subscribe: , Sender: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com Errors-To: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 10 Jun 2007 04:50:27.0269 (UTC) FILETIME=[DD3E3750:01C7AB1A] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Hello, My name is Ginger Lea. I am a known model/porn star. Someone stole my pictures and videos and posted them on a website that is currently hosted by your company (www.gingerlea.org). If you do not stop hosting such website immediately I will pursue legal action against your company. Obviously, I can provide proof of my identity, if necessary. Regards, Ginger Lea p.s. I mistakenly sent a copy of this e-mail using a friend e-mail. sorry about the duplicate. --------------------------------- Moody friends. Drama queens. Your life? Nope! - their life, your story. Hello,

My name is Ginger Lea. I am a known model/porn star.
Someone stole my pictures and videos and posted them
on a website that is currently hosted by your company
(www.gingerlea.org). If you do not stop hosting such
website immediately I will pursue legal action against
your company.  Obviously, I can provide proof of my identity, if necessary.


Regards,
Ginger Lea
 
p.s. I mistakenly sent a copy of this e-mail using a friend e-mail.  sorry about the duplicate.

Moody friends. Drama queens. Your life? Nope! - their life, your story.
Play Sims Stories at Yahoo! Games. MIME element (text/plain) MIME element (text/plain)
